physical_examinations.relevant_findings: General: NAD, A&O x3; Cardiovascular: Normal rate, regular rhythm, S1/S2, no m/r/g; Pulmonary: No respiratory distress, CTAB, no adventitious sounds; Abdomen: Soft, non-tender, non-distended, steri-strips c/d/i over surgical incisions, no signs of infection; Extremities: WWP, palpable pedal pulses b/l
